page.title: 15THE MILITARY ROAD.
page.content: The{MILITARY ROAD}is in the south_east of the{ISLE OF WIGHT. It was built in World WarII by German prisoners of war.The road runs from {BLACKGANG}to{FRESHWATER,}along the length of the ISLE OF WIGHT. The road is built in a geologically unstable area and therefore needs constant repairs and upkeep.It a great matter of concern for the people on the ISLE OF WIGHT.The road is allowed to survive because it would be very expensive and time consuming to build another. Even though the area is unsafe the road is popular with motorists and thus its demise is not forseeable, and it remains the only major road in the area.
